title: Sarah Jessica Parker Reflects on 25 Years of Carrie Bradshaw as Helen Mirren Pays Tribute to the Actresses That Inspire Her at Golden Eve Ceremony
summary: Parker and Mirren were honored, respectively, with the Carol Burnett Award and the Cecil B. DeMille Award at the special Golden Globes event.

title: Tanker Rate Relief Boosts U.S. Crude, For Now
summary: A dip in tanker rates has improved the price outlook for U.S. crude this month, as it signals stronger demand. title: Data Centers Drive Record Costs in PJM Power Capacity Auctions
